overview:
Adam Honig actively guides the vision, strategy and operations of Innoveer Solutions, and helps the firm excel at providing services that achieve business objectives. Under Adamâ€™s direction, Innoveer Solutions has achieved industry-leading customer satisfaction levels, won numerous awards and achieved a world-class reputation.

Prior to Innoveer Solutions, Adam helped build, grow and manage numerous successful technology firms, including Internet consulting firm C-bridge Internet Solutions and middleware software development firm Open Environment Corporation. He began his career at Cambridge Technology Partners. Throughout his career, Adam has built a reputation for guiding organizations and helping them grow, by balancing operational expertise with a rigorous understanding of how to best apply technology and process changes to achieve business goals.

funding_round.source_description: Innoveer takes in $1.9M in new fundraise
